title: [LOVE] Ep. 236 How To Improve Your Intimacy and Pleasure with Alicia Davon
itunes:title: [LOVE] Ep. 236 How To Improve Your Intimacy and Pleasure with Alicia Davon
description:
Get your own copy of Ashley’s new book You Turn at youturnbook.com!

 

How satisfied are you with your intimacy in relationships?

 

This week Ash talks with Alicia Davon on all things pleasure. Alicia holds a Master's degree in Integral Psychology with a focus on women's romantic and sensual expression. She is an extended orgasm teacher and the founder of the Davon Method here to help you create the relationship, and intimacy, of your dreams.

 

Alicia shares reasons why a relationship may have lost its intimacy and spark and how to reconnect and build passion back into the relationship. Alicia and Ash dive into the psychological and health issues centered around sexuality and intimacy for both men and women.

 

If you have been struggling to orgasm, build more intimacy in your relationship, or are looking to expand your access to pleasure in life, this episode is filled with juicy insights for you!

 

In This Episode, You’ll Learn:

  1. How to overcome the common relationship challenges in regards to pleasure.
  2. Erectile dysfunction: why it happens and how a couple can work through this.
  3. What to consider if you are curious about entering into an open relationship.
  4. Tools to expand pleasure in your love life.
  5. The phases of a relationship and what to work through within each.

 

Where to Connect with Alicia Davon:

https://erwandavon.com/

@davonmethod

TEXT 415-308-9580
